QueryViewSpec.Name: Prospect Financial Sponsors Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Used to find the financial prospect sponsors that should not be converted.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select s.CONSTITUENTID as FINANCIALSPONSORID, c.LOOKUPID as FINANCIALSPONSORLOOKUPID, s.ID as SPONSORSHIPID, s.STARTDATE, s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, case when so_child.ID is not null then 'Child' else 'Project' end as SPONSORSHIPTYPE, so.LOOKUPID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYLOOKUPID, (select min(STARTDATE) from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s2 join dbo.REVENUESPLIT r_split2 on r_split2.ID = s2.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION f_trans2 on r_split2.REVENUEID = f_trans2.ID join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION s_ext2 on s2.ID = s_ext2.ID join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE s_code2 on s_ext2.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID = s_code2.ID where s2.STATUSCODE = 1 --Active and lower (s_code2.DESCRIPTION) = LOWER ('Prospect Sponsored') and f_trans2.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID) as EARLIESTACTIVEPROSPECTSPONSORSHIPSTARTDATE,
(select max (STARTDATE) from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s3 join dbo.REVENUESPLIT r_split3 on r_split3.ID = s3.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION f_trans3 on r_split3.REVENUEID = f_trans3.ID join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION s_ext3 on s3.ID = s_ext3.ID join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE s_code3 on s_ext3.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID = s_code3.ID where s3.STATUSCODE = 1 --Active and lower (s_code3.DESCRIPTION) = LOWER ('Prospect Sponsored') and f_trans3.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID) as LATESTACTIVEPROSPECTSPONSORSHIPSTARTDATE
from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s join dbo.REVENUESPLIT r_split on r_split.ID = s.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION f_trans on r_split.REVENUEID = f_trans.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on f_trans.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION s_ext on s.ID = s_ext.ID join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE s_code on s_ext.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID = s_code.ID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.ID
where s.STATUSCODE = 1 --Active and lower (s_code.DESCRIPTION) = LOWER ('Prospect Sponsored') and s.CONSTITUENTID not in (select ID from USR_V_QUERY_PROSPECTSTOCONVERT)
